raw_body:
MATHES – FRANCISCA IRIS MAGDALENE – It is with deep sorrow that we announce the death of Mrs Francisca Iris Magdalene Mathes,​ beloved wife of the late Arthur Mathes,​ loving mother of Premilla Preena,​ Dulal Mathes,​ Chandrika Wickramarathne,​ Anil Mathes and Assanke Mathes,​ loving sister of Vernon Fernando,​ Cedric Fernando and late Douglas Fernando,​ beloved mother-in-law of Tony Preena,​ Mary Downs,​ Visal Wickramarathne,​ Emma Mathes and Lynette Mathes. She passed away peacefully on 12.03.2024. Funeral arrangements :- Remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour from 9.30 a.m. to 8.30 p.m. on Friday,​ the 15th of March and 9.30 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. on Saturday,​ the 16th of March. Cortege leaves the Parlour for Cremation on Saturday,​ the 16th of March at 4.30 p.m. for General Cemetery Borella.
018340
